Class MainTask

java.lang.Object
  moa.AbstractMOAObject
      moa.options.AbstractOptionHandler
          moa.tasks.AbstractTask
              moa.tasks.MainTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, MOAObject, OptionHandler, Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
EvaluateClustering, EvaluateInterleavedChunks, EvaluateInterleavedTestThenTrain, EvaluateModel, EvaluatePeriodicHeldOutTest, EvaluatePrequential, LearnModel, MeasureStreamSpeed, Plot, RunTasks, WriteStreamToARFFFile
public abstract class MainTask
extends AbstractTask

Abstract Main Task. All tasks that want to write their result to a file must extend this class.

Version:
$Revision: 7 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)

Method Detail

doTaskImpl

protected Object doTaskImpl(TaskMonitor monitor,
                            ObjectRepository repository)
Description copied from class: AbstractTask
This method performs this task. AbstractTask implements doTask so all its extensions only need to implement doTaskImpl.

Specified by:
doTaskImpl in class AbstractTask
Parameters:
monitor - the TaskMonitor to use
repository - the ObjectRepository to use
Returns:
an object with the result of this task

doMainTask

protected abstract Object doMainTask(TaskMonitor monitor,
                                     ObjectRepository repository)
This method performs this task. AbstractTask implements doTask, that uses doTaskImpl. MainTask implements doTaskImpl using doMainTask so its extensions only need to implement doMainTask.

Parameters:
monitor - the TaskMonitor to use
repository - the ObjectRepository to use
Returns:
an object with the result of this task
